sourcesContent:
import {
  Box,
  Container,
  Text,
  Center,
  VStack,
  Input,
  Flex,
  FormControl,
  FormLabel,
  Button,
} from "@chakra-ui/react";

export const Login = () => {
  return (
    <Flex
      width="100vw"
      height="100vh"
      bgColor="#121214"
      direction="column"
      justify="center"
      align="center"
    >
      <Text color="#FF577F" fontWeight="bold">
        Kenzie Hub
      </Text>
      <VStack w="260px" h="400px">
        <form onSubmit={() => {}}>
          <FormControl>
            <Box w="100%">
              <FormLabel color="#F8F9FA" fontSize="xs">
                Email
              </FormLabel>
            </Box>
            <Input placeholder="Digite seu email" bg="#343B41" />
            <Box w="100%" mt="20px">
              <FormLabel color="#F8F9FA" fontSize="xs">
                Senha
              </FormLabel>
            </Box>
            <Input placeholder="Digite sua senha" bg="#343B41" />
            <Button
              w="100%"
              mt="20px"
              bgColor="#FF577F"
              color="#FFF"
              type="submit"
              borderRadius="4px"
            >
              Entrar
            </Button>
          </FormControl>
        </form>
        <Box p="0px 30px">
          <Text color="#868E96" fontSize="xs">
            Ainda nÃ£o possui uma conta?
          </Text>
        </Box>
        <Button isFullWidth bgColor="#868E96" color="#FFF" borderRadius="4px">
          Cadastre-se
        </Button>
      </VStack>
    </Flex>
  );
};
